author: Matt Haig
review: A captivating story about the choices we make and second chances. It makes you reflect on your own life choices.

author: Charles Duhigg
review: An insightful look into how habits shape our lives and how we can leverage them for better outcomes.

bookName: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
review: A refreshing take on personal growth with an emphasis on embracing life’s limitations and prioritizing what truly matters.

author: Michelle Obama
review: Michelle Obama’s personal journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, filled with determination and resilience.

author: Paulo Coelho
review: A poetic journey of self-discovery and following one's dreams, set against the backdrop of the deserts of Egypt.

bookName: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
review: A profound exploration of humanity’s history, evolution, and impact on the world, offering insights into our shared past and future.
